languages.text: The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|6c70b429eea84371b8efa579bcc1297c}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Their incoming energy, fire, and {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} are reduced by −35%.
